A fūinjutsu that can be used in collaboration with [[Dharma Power Sealing Technique: Sen no Rikyū]] to seal a [[tailed beast]] inside a person, making them a [[jinchūriki]]. The seal itself takes the form of [[wikipedia:Japanese calligraphy|Japanese calligraphy]]. When Hōichi fought against [[Gaara]] and [[Fū]], two jinchūriki from whom he was tasked to steal their tailed beast [[chakra]], he claimed that it was a perfect time to test the power of the seal.
